summary_md: Montenegro, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 8,553 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 3.34% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 14.10% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 77.59 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 89.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 44.87% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Montenegro's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 8,553 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth rate of 44.87% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 14.10% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the percentage of the workforce that is jobless.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Montenegro is relatively high, with usage at 89.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), suggesting a significant portion of the population has access to digital services.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Montenegro is 77.59 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the overall health environment of the country.
